articles.title: Covid-19 Australia: NSW records 19 cases overnight as Sydney enters its third day of lockdown

articles.content:
New South Wales has recorded 19 cases overnight as Sydney endures its third day of a hard 14-day Covid-19 lockdown.

articles.title: Monsoon update: Monsoon likely to reach Delhi early by June 15, 12 days ahead of schedule
articles.description: Monsoon update: According to the weather office forecast, light to moderate rain and thundershowers are likely in many parts of Haryana and Punjab on June 14 and 15.
articles.content: The southwest monsoon is likely to reach Delhi early by June 15, 12 days before its usual date of June 27, the India Meteorological Department (IMD) officials said. Normally, the monsoon reaches Delh… [+1800 chars]

articles.title: Pandemic air quality due to weather, not just lockdowns, study finds
articles.description: Using a diverse set of tools, researchers show how the pandemic did -- or didn't -- affect fine particulate matter concentrations during COVID lockdowns.
articles.content: Headlines proclaiming Covid lockdowns drastically reduced pollution were mostly referring to nitrogen dioxide, NO2, a reactive gas emitted from burning fuel. There had been less understanding of how … [+5470 chars]
